message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'll take $45, you get $55.  This seems fair considering the inflation will hit me harder.
Bob, let's be real, the inflation is hitting you hard. I'll take $65, you get $35. It's better than what you'll have next round.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is now $40 for me, $60 for you.  Take it before the inflation eats up even more of my share!
